interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Wicked Witch of Kumon-mi " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " The Value of Sharing " .

progression.synopsis: While Sensei is busy with Makoto , Rin goes to talk to Chika . They compliment each other's costumes, and Rin is clearly not fully over Chika. Chika has persuaded Yumi to come to the party, albeit without a costume. Rin asks if Chika knows the reasons for Yumi behavior towards Futaba , but she doesn't. Yumi arrives, and the three have an awkward conversation. Rin starts to tease Yumi a bit about having a "cute side", and Yumi goes off to look for food.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.10p1.
